995190.name: NASCAR Heat 3 - December Pack
995190.description:
The NASCAR Heat 3 December DLC includes 47 new paint schemes from the Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series, including 11 race win schemes from the second half of the 2018 season. It also includes 10 schemes from the NASCAR XFINITY Series, 9 from the NASCAR Camping World Truck Series, and 3 new Challenges!

Expect paint schemes like the following:

MENCS:
Martin Truex Jr., Sonoma "Race Win" Scheme
Brad Keselowski, Las Vegas "Race Win" Scheme
Ryan Blaney, The Roval "Race Win" Scheme

NXS:
Ty Dillon, Nexium Clear Minis Scheme
Brandon Jones, Juniper Networks Scheme

NCWTS:
Todd Gilliland, Pedigree Puppy Scheme
Harrison Burton, Hunt Brother’s Pizza Scheme
Plus many more!
995190.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
